pageTitle: ODFW Hunting and Trapping License Fees
textBeforeTable: Small Game Resources Small Game Hunting and Trapping $22.00 (Annual Pass) $7.00 (One Day Pass) Fifteen ODFW Wildlife Areas require a parking permit: Coyote Springs, Denman, E.E. Wilson, Elkhorn, Fern Ridge, Irrigon, Jewell Meadows, Klamath, Ladd Marsh, Phillip W. Schneider, Power City, Sauvie Island, Summer Lake, White River, and Willow Creek Wildlife Areas. ODFW Wildlife Area Parking Permits $4.00 $4.00 Wildlife Area Bird Hunt Reservation/Permit $38.50 --- Nonresident Bird Stamp (Validation*) --- $11.50 Waterfowl Bird Stamp (Validation*) --- $8.50 Upland Game Bird Stamp (Validation*) $4.00 $4.00 Game Bird Permit/Reservation (Fern Ridge, Klamath Falls , Sage Grouse, Sauvie Island) $77.50 $22.50 Turkey Tag $17.00 $17.00 Pheasant Tag (Denman, E.E. Wilson, Fern Ridge, Sauvie Island ) Hunting Tags Permits and Validations
textAfterTable: Juveniles younger than 14 See license requirements above Small Game Hunting and Trapping License Requirements Juveniles younger than 14 years of age are not required to purchase a license, except to hunt or trap bobcat and otter; but, they must complete the Trapper Education course and register to receive a brand number through the Salem ODFW office. Landowners must obtain either a furtaker’s license, a hunting license for furbearers, or a free license to take furbearers on land they own and on which they reside. To receive the free license, the landowner must obtain from ODFW Salem Headquarters a receipt of registration for the location of such land prior to hunting or trapping furbearing mammals on that land. Furtakers License and Tag Fees Furtakers need only (1) license. A Furtaker's License allows the holder to trap, hunt and pursue. A Hunting License for Furbearers allows the holder only to hunt and pursue. Duplicate License and Tags Miscellaneous Resident Nonresident Duplicate License and Tags $17.00 $25.00 NEW Duplicate Hunter Education Card $10.00 $10.00 NEW Landowner Preference Registration
